channel.title: I get disconnected from my server when I teleport
channel.description: I get disconnected when I try to teleport to barrows, Jad and stuff.. I tried using Silab and mopar client but still just disconnects me. I'm using a server source by the way so I didn't make. Sorry I'm new but does anyone know how to fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 06:48:31 pm[/size][hr]anyone help please? I seem to be freezing when I trade NPC's and sometimes equipping items..some things won't freeze If I go on mopar client and some won't freeze when I go on silab. Anyone know how to fix this please? some teleport locations will only work for mopar client

item.title: I get disconnected from my server when I teleport
item.dc:creator: @steelrends steelrends
item.description:
@steelrends wrote:

I get disconnected when I try to teleport to barrows, Jad and stuff… I tried using Silab and mopar client but still just disconnects me. I’m using a server source by the way so I didn’t make. Sorry I’m new but does anyone know how to fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 06:48:31 pm[/size][hr]anyone help please? I seem to be freezing when I trade NPC’s and sometimes equipping items…some things won’t freeze If I go on mopar client and some won’t freeze when I go on silab. Anyone know how to fix this please? some teleport locations will only work for mopar client
